resumeModels.headline: Data Scientist
resumeModels.summary:
Around 7 years of professional experience in the Insurance, Banking and Financial Services Industry performing Statistical Modelling, Data Extraction, Data cleaning, Data screening, Data Exploration and Data Visualization of structured and unstructured datasets as well as implementing large scale Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms to deliver resourceful insights, inferences which significantly impacted business revenues and user experience.

• Experienced in Facilitating the entire lifecycle of a data science project: Data Extraction, Data Pre-Processing, Feature Engineering, Dimensionality Reduction, Algorithm implementation, Back Testing and Validation.
• Expert knowledge in breadth of machine learning algorithms and love to find the best approach to a specific problem. Implemented several supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms such as Ensemble Methods (Random forests), Linear, Polynomial, Logistic Regression, Regularized Linear Regression, SVMs, Deep Neural Networks, Extreme Gradient Boosting, Decision Trees, KMeans, K-NN , Gaussian Mixture Models, Hierarchical models, and time series models (ARIMA, GARCH, VARCH etc.).
• Proficient in Data transformations using log, square-root, reciprocal, cube root, square and complete box-cox transformation depending upon the dataset.
• Fluent and well-versed writing production quality code in R, Python, SAS, and SQL. Developed and deployed dashboards in Tableau and RShiny to identify trends and opportunities, surface actionable insights, and help teams set goals, forecasts and prioritization of initiatives.
• Knowledge of normality tests like Shapiro-Wilk, Anderson-Darling.
• In-depth Knowledge of Dimensionality Reduction (PCA, t-SNE), Hyper-parameter tuning, Model Regularization (Ridge, Lasso, Elastic Net) and Grid Search techniques to optimize model performance.
• Experienced in developing algorithms to create Artificial Neural Networks(ANN), Deep Learning, to implement AI solutions.
• Experience with Python libraries including NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Scikit-Learn, MatplotLib, Seaborn, geopy, NLTK and R libraries like ggplot2, dplyr, Lattice, Highcharter etc.
• Exposure to Web Data Mining with Python's ScraPy and BeautifulSoup packages along with working knowledge of Natural Language Processing (n) to analyze text patterns.
• Excellent exposure to Data Visualization with Tableau, PowerBI, Seaborn, Matplotlib and ggplot2.
• Certified Bloomberg Market Concepts (BMC)

resumeModels.headline: Data Scientist - Capital One
resumeModels.summary:
* Around 5 years of experience as a Data Analyst, Data Scientist, Python Developer, proficient coder in multiple languages and environments including Python, REST API, AWS, C, C++ and SQL.
* Experience in writing Sub Queries, Stored Procedures, Triggers, Cursors, andFunctions on MySQL and PostgreSQL database.
* Experience in problem solving, data science, Machine learning, statistical inference, predictive analytics, descriptive analytics, prescriptive analytics, graph analysis, natural language processing, and computational linguistics; with extensive experience in predivtive analytics and recommendation.
* Hands on experience on clustering algorithms like K-means & Medoids clustering and Predictive and Descriptive algorithms.
* Expertise in Model Development, Data Mining, Predictive Modeling, Descriptive Modeling Data Visualization, Data Clearing and Management, and Database Management.
* Experience using machine learning models such as random forest, KNN, SVM, logistic regression and used packages such as ggplot, dplyr, lm, rpart, Random Forest, nnet, PROC-(pca, dtree, corr, princomp, gplot, logistic, cluster), NumPy, sci-kit learn, pandas, etc., in R, SAS and python.
* Logistic Regression, SVM, Clustering, neural networks, Principal Component Analysis and good knowledge on Recommender Systems.
* Proficient in Statistical Modeling and Machine Learning techniques (Linear, Logistics, Decision Trees, Random Forest, SVM, K-Nearest Neighbors, Bayesian, XGBoost) in Forecasting/ Predictive Analytics, Segmentation methodologies, Regression-based models, Hypothesis testing, Factor analysis/ PCA, Ensembles.
* Hands on experience with NLP Libraries like NLTK and word embedding techniques like  Word2Vec, Tf-idf, LDA etc.
* Proficient at building robust Machine Learning, Deep Learning models, Convolution Neural Networks (CNN), Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN), Artificial Neural Network (ANN), LSTM using Tensor Flow and Keras. Adept in analyzing large datasets using Apache Spark, PySpark, Spark ML and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
* Extensive experience in Text Analytics, developing different Statistical Machine Learning, Data Mining solutions to various business problems and generating data visualizations using R, Python, and Tableau.
* Experience in using various packages in R and python like ggplot2, caret, dplyr, Rweka, gmodels, RCurl, tm, C50, twitteR, NLP, Reshape2, rjson, plyr, pandas, numpy, seaborn, scipy, matplotlib, scikit-learn, Beautiful Soup, Rpy2.
* In-depth knowledge of Hadoop big data ecosystem components like Pig, Hive, Sqoop, Flume, Oozie.
* Strong ability to analyze sets of data for signals, patterns, ways to group data to answer questions and solve complex data puzzles.
* Experienced in D3.js for interactive web/dashboard applications.
* Worked with NoSQL Database including HBase, Cassandra, and MongoDB.
* Strong experience in Big Data technologies like Spark 2.x, SparkSQL, PySpark, Hadoop 2.X, HDFS, Hive 2.X.
* Experienced in Data Integration Validation and Data Quality controls for ETL process and Data Warehousing using MS Visual Studio, SSIS, SSAS, and SSRS.
* Good experience of software development in Python and IDEs: pycharm, sublime text, Jupyter Notebook.
* Experience in Python Development and Scientific Programming, and using Numpy and Pandas in Python for Data Manipulation.
* Good Knowledge in Amazon AWS concepts like EMR and EC2 web services which provides fast and efficient processing of Big Data.
* Experience in ETL using SSIS.
* Worked on analyzing complex data from various data repositories and became familiar with user base locations.
* Expertise in performing development activities from gathering requirements and designing solutions, through developing code/ reports to testing, release/deployment.
* Experience in Tableau, involved in creating Dashboards, reports as needed using TableauDesktop.
* Experience in Jira, involved in tracking bugs, creating reports and tracking daily progress of Project.
* Taking part in daily stand-ups meetings.
* Assisted in doing minutes in meeting and creating a reports on it.
* Created multiple SSIS packages
* Involved in Full Life Cycle Development of Reporting Projects, includes Requirements
* Involved in Gathering/ analysis, Design, Development, Testing and Production rollover.
* Proficient in design and development of various dashboards, reports utilizing Tableau Visualizations like Dual Axis, Bar Graphs, Scatter Plots, Pie-Charts, Heat Maps, Bubble Charts, Tree Maps, Funnel Charts, Box Plots, Waterfall Charts, Geographic Visualization and other making use of actions, other local and global filters according to the end user requirement.
* Worked extensively on joining tables, multiple data connections using blending, worked on Data Extracts and managing queries.
* Experience in administering, customizing JIRA projects, and performing migrations;
* Familiarity with software development methodologies like Agile, including issue/workflow tracking tools like Jira and version control tools like git and GitHub
* Having working experience in Normalization and De-Normalization techniques for both.
* Worked on the development of dashboard reports for the Key Performance Indicators (KPI) for the top management.
* Mastered the ability to design and deploy rich graphic visualizations with Drill Down and Drop-Down menu option and parameterized using Tableau Desktop.
* Having experience in performing VLOOKUP's, HLookup's, Power pivot and Pivot table in MS - Excel.
* Experience in working under Agile (Scrum) and Waterfall models of software development life cycle.

resumeModels.summary:
• 3+ years of experience and comprehensive industry knowledge of Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Data Analytics, Data Modeling, Data Architecture, Data Analysis, Data Mining, Text Mining & Natural Language Processing (NLP), Artificial Intelligence algorithms, Business Intelligence, Analytics Models (like Decision Trees, Linear & Logistic Regression), R, Python, Java, Spark, Scala, MS Excel, SQL and Postgre SQL.
• Extensive experience in data analysis, machine learning, predictive modelling, statistics, and other data science techniques to derive actionable insights.
• Proficient in working with several python and R libraries including Pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, Scikit-learn, SciPy, GGplot, NLTK, TwitterR, ROAuth, Beautiful-soup, python-twitter, PyMySQL and sqlalchemy.
• Professional working experience in machine learning algorithms like Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees (CART), Naive Bayes, K-Nearest neighbors, and NLP
• Proficiency and understanding of supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms like Random forest, SVM, Clustering, Deep learning algorithms, neural networks, TensorFlow and Keras.
• Solid experience on cross-validation, ML / DL optimization, model regularization and dropouts
• Experience in tuning algorithms using methods such as Grid Search, K-Fold Cross Validation and Error Analysis.
• Also worked with several boosting methodologies like ADA Boost, Gradient Boosting and XGBoost.
• Validated the machine learning classifiers using Accuracy, AUC, ROC Curves.
• Worked with various text analytics or Word Embedding libraries like Word2Vec, Count Vectorizer, GloVe etc.
• Knowledge in analyzing large datasets using Apache Spark, PySpark, Spark ML and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
• Working experience of advanced Microsoft Excel functions, ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) of data into a data warehouse/data mart and Business Intelligence (BI) tools like Tableau (Data visualization and Analytics) and power BI.
• Hands on experience in writing queries in SQL to extract, transform and load (ETL) data from large data warehouse systems involving Terabytes worth of data.
• Experience in word vectorization, vector semantics, embedding and using methodologies such as Gensim
• Knowledge of REST API and general working knowledge of the mainframe.
• Hands-on-Experience in designing and developing NLP models for sentiment Analysis.
• Experience in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)-Agile and waterfall Process
• Hands-on experience with industry-standard IDEs like PyCharm, Jupyter Notebook.
• Good experience in Shell Scripting, SQL Server, UNIX and Linux.
• Good knowledge of version control software Git and GitHub
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, efficient time management and organization skills, ability to handle multiple tasks and work well in a team environment.

resumeModels.headline: Lead Data Scientist
resumeModels.summary:
• Data scientist/engineer/analyst with a passion for statistics/machine learning/deep learning and focused on providing insightful data-driven solutions. I have 6+ years' experience in data analytics and data engineering in various fields of E-Commerce, manufacturer, finance and infrastructure. My current research and development interests include data engineering, machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and experimentation.
• Adept in predictive modeling, machine learning and data mining with extensive use of Python and R with platform of Jupyter Notebook, PyCharm, R-Studio, Tableau, Hadoop Spark for data analysis/ mining and data visualization implementations.
• Solid theory background for machine learning, data mining, text mining, graph mining, statistics modeling, NLP and deep learning.
• Hands-on Experience in predictive analytic procedures used in supervised learning (Classification, Regression, Decision trees, Random Forest, SVM, Neural Networks), unsupervised learning (Clustering and PCA), and reinforcement learning.
• Expert in Natural Language Processing like Tokenization, Normalization, POS Tagging, Parsing, Named Entity Recognition and Key Phrase Extraction, Relationship extraction, Information Retrieval, Sentimental Classification, Machine Translation, etc.
• Solid knowledge of deep learning algorithms like CNN, RNN, LSTM, GRU, attention model, Autoencoder, fasttext, etc. for text mining.
• Strong with data visualization tools like Tableau like designing view for analysis by writing Tableau function/formulas, using Line chart, bar chart, histogram, Bullet Graph, Heat map, Map, and using data sets, groups, bins, annotations and mark labels, filters, with prediction and trend lines, etc.
• Experience in hypothesis testing, multivariate testing (A/B testing) and optimization algorithms, descriptive, exploratory, inferential, predictive modeling of the given scenario along with data modeling.
• Involved in diagnosing and resolving predictive / analytical model performance issues, monitoring analytical system performance and implementing efficiency improvements.
• Conversant with MS SQL/ Oracle PLSQL/MYSQL and RDBMS. Contributed in data definitions for new database file/table development and/or changes to existing ones as needed for analysis and mining purpose.
• Worked on Big Data Analytics, Hadoop ecosystems (Hadoop, Sqoop, Hive, Pig, and MapReduce) and Spark.
• Experienced in front-end developing using PHP, HTML, Java, JavaScript, C++ and back-end developing using C.

Core Qualifications

Roles: Data Scientist, Data Analyst, Business System Analyst, Oracle PLSQL developer.
Data Visualization: Tableau, R visualization packages, Microsoft Excel.
Data Analytics Tools/Programming: Python (numpy, scipy, pandas, scikit-learn, gensim, keras), R (caret, weka, and ggplot), SQL, Microsoft SQL Server, MYSQL, Oracle PLSQL, Hadoop, Hive, and MapReduce.
Machine Learning: Tensorflow, Keras, SkLearn, Turi-Create, classification, regression, clustering, feature engineering.
Big Data Tools: Hadoop, MapReduce, SQOOP, Pig, Hive, NOSQL, Cassandra, Spark.
Others: Deep Learning, NLP, Topic Modeling, Graph Mining, Text Mining, C, C++, PHP, JavaScript, ASP, Shell Scripting, Turi-Bolt.

resumeModels.headline: Data scientist/Machine learning
resumeModels.summary:
• Over 8+ years of IT industry experience encompassing in Machine Learning, Datamining with large datasets of Structured and Unstructured data, data Acquisition, data Validation, Predictive modeling, data Visualization.
• Extensive experience in Text Analytics, developing different statistical machine learning, Datamining solutions to various business problems and generating data visualizations using R, Python, and Tableau.
• Over 5+Experience with Machine learning techniques and algorithms (such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, etc.)
• Experience object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts using Python, C++ and PHP.
• Have knowledge on advanced SAS programming techniques, such as PROC SQL (JOIN/ UNION), PROC APPEND, PROC DATASETS, and PROC TRANSPOSE.
• Integration Architect & Data Scientist experience in Analytics, Bigdata, BPM, SOA, ETL and Cloud technologies.
• Highly skilled in using visualization tools like Tableau, ggplot2, and d3.js for creating dashboards.
• Tagging of experience in foundational machine learning models and concepts: regression, random forest, boosting, GBM, NNs, HMMs, CRFs, MRFs, deep learning.
• Proficiency in understanding statistical and other tools/languages - R, Python, C, C++, Java, SQL, UNIX, QlikView data visualization tool and Anaplan forecasting tool.
• Proficient in the Integration of various data sources with multiple relational databases like Oracle/, MS SQL Server, DB2, Teradata and Flat Files into the staging area, ODS, data Warehouse and DataMart.
• Familiar on Deep learning projects for image identification CNN, RNN for stock price prediction autoencoders for Movie Recommender System (PyTorch), Image captioning (CNN-RNN autoencoder architecture).
• Exposure to AI and Deep learning platforms/methodologies like tensor flow, RNN, LSTM
• Build LSTM neural network for text, like item description, comments.
